title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with Crown Prince Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
September 12, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke today with Crown Prince Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan of the United Arab Emirates to discuss efforts to resolve the ongoing dispute with Qatar. The President underscored the importance of unity among United States partners in the region and the need for all countries to do more to cut off funding for terrorist groups, discredit extremist ideology, and defeat terrorism.
